issue.title: Add TPC support to update pipeline

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
- Switch the update pipeline to use the relational model for command ordering, this is required for a robust implementation of seed data support for TPC
- Add provider value comparer
- Most of the new API is pubternal for now as it doesn't seem very useful to providers

Part of #3170

issue.title: Document value comparer breaking change

repository.name: EntityFramework.Docs
repository.description: Documentation for Entity Framework Core and Entity Framework 6

issue.body:
If a custom value comparer was specified for PK or FK properties (case-insensitive for example) it now needs to also be specified as a provider value comparer for `SaveChanges` to work correctly

See https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/pull/27737 and https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/27738

issue.title: Allow to set provider value comparer when configuring value conversion

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
- Use client value comparer as provider value comparer if possible
	- The client value comparer will not be used if the model type is a nullable value type since we need the types to match exactly and the provider type is never nullable
- Fix some API issues
- Remove some unused code

Fixes #27738
Fixes #27850
Fixes #27791
Part of #27588
